title: New: Tracing Silhouettes – A Grave For The Dying Sun
body:
It’s always fascinating to witness how certain brands of music are re-interpreted in varying parts of the world.

Electronic music is possibly the easiest to analyse, as it translates so rapidly throughout cultures, with each artist picking up the baton and injecting their own personal experiences and influences. Singapore based producer **Tracing Silhouettes** adopts a minimal, almost drone inspired approach, with his debut track _A Grave For The Dying Sun_ building from an ambient, sample driven number to an almost chillwave inspired piece. Check it out below.
